Description.Text: Set in the heart of London, newly designed Simply Rooms & Suites is one of the new boutique London hotels with a smart concept near Olympia Exhibition Center. Located only 400 meters from Kensington (Olympia) underground station, and a stones throw away from Kensington High Street, the hotel offer affordable high quality 4* accommodation. Simply Rooms & Suites offers a wide range of room types, from contemporary singles to deluxe studio suites. The hotel provides a range of luxury in-room amenities including free Wi-Fi, secure wired internet, flat screen TVs, whilst the deluxe rooms offer mini kitchens.Simply Rooms & Suites, with its transparent pricing policy, has been designed for the value conscious guests wanting quality accommodation. By eliminating the unnecessary extra facilities, and combining the ethos of a boutique hotel with that of a budget hotel, Simply Rooms & Suites offers affordable luxury and convenience.

The unique Kensington location opposite Olympia Exhibition Halls and within easy access to Earls Court means Simply Rooms & Suites is the ideal location for attending events and shows. Should you wish to explore the rest that London has to offer, the hotel is located close to all major transport links. Kensington (Olympia) underground station and West Kensington underground station are both within a 5 minute walk.

London is famous for its tourist attractions. Many of these such as the Natural History Museum, The Victoria & Albert Museum, The Royal Albert Hall, Kensington Palace, The Science Museum, and Kensington Palace Gardens, are all within walking distance or a short bus or tube ride away.

Classic Double - The standard rooms accommodate up to 2 guests in either a double bed or twin beds. Guests will enjoy the high tech attributes inc free wifi, broadband, European sockets and a flat LCD TV.
Classic Twin - The standard rooms accommodate up to 2 guests in either a double bed or twin beds. Guests will enjoy the high tech attributes inc free wifi, broadband, European sockets and a flat LCD TV.
Executive Double - Executive Double room offers 1 double bed. The luxury rooms accommodate up to 2 guests and include a mini kitchen unit with microwave, fridge, crockery, cutlery, kettle and sink. Guests will enjoy the high tech attributes inc free wifi, broadband, European sockets and a flat LCD TV.
Deluxe Suite - Deluxe Suite offers 1 king bed. The Studio Suites accommodate up to 2 guests, and houses a separate kitchen including a fridge, freezer, oven, hob and microwave. Guests will enjoy the high tech attributes inc free wifi, broadband, European sockets and a flat LCD TV.
